comments.body: Hm, doesn't this change `sizeof(uv_tty_t)` on Windows? I think this creates a one-byte gap between `ansi_csi_argc` and `ansi_csi_argv`.

The members of the `tty` union are `rd` and `wd`. Since the size of `rd` is at least 1 byte larger than `wd`, changing the size of `ansi_parser_state` in `wd` from `char` to `short` does not change the size of `uv_tty_t`. Before committing, I used `sizeof(uv_tty_t)` to make sure the size did not change.

Ref. https://github.com/libuv/libuv/pull/1884/files#r366560343
